name: NIGHT (Nextech)
description:
This game is made in 7 days for the Blackthornprod game jam. 

How this game fits the theme: You should keep running and avoid the spike. You can only see the spike in the radiation of the moonlight. The less live you have more distance you can see.

All the game art and code are made by myself during this game jam.

I spent more time in-game art than programming so there might some bugs and I make this game simple. Your score and live will be automatically reset if you die.

This is the first time participating game jam. This is the first time I developed a game.

Controls:

  • Press any key to start
  • Space to jump
  • Space double-time to double jump
